about_the_game:
“Move Out Manor” is a grid-based action puzzle game set in a haunted mansion. Explore the halls of the manor, find keys to enter its rooms, and pack up everything in sight while avoiding spooky ghosts. Now featuring 15 rooms and 7 halls to test your skill.

Story

Alec was beyond excited. The moving company hired him to clear out a "large house in the English countryside" for more money than he normally makes in a year. Just one house! How hard could it be?

Now, Alec finds himself alone in a haunted mansion full of ghosts and strange conveyor belts. He must pack up everything he can to stop the ghosts and get out before he, too, becomes a permanent resident!

Game play

Experience a blend of puzzle and action game play. Pack the right items into moving boxes and ship them out on conveyor belts. Vanquish the giant ghosts locking you in and avoid the little ghosts blocking your path. Traverse levels using special teleporting conveyor belts. Know when to think and when to run!

Game stats

Your fastest times, fewest deaths, and fewest movements are saved for every room in the house. Attempt the same room as many times as you want to improve your stats.

name: Move Out Manor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: “Move Out Manor” is a grid-based action puzzle game set in a haunted mansion. Explore the halls of the manor, find keys to enter its rooms, and pack up everything in sight while avoiding spooky ghosts. Move out quick, or you may become a permanent resident!
